  <div style="text-align: left;">[[TableOfContents|Table of Contents]] | [[Cassandra_Connection_Parameters|Previous]] | [[Doradus_Query_Parameters|Next]] | [[Index|Index]]</div>
  <div style="color: #999999; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; text-align: left;">
    <span>[[Doradus_Configuration_and_Operation|Doradus Configuration and Operation]]</span> : <span>[[Doradus_Configuration_Files|Doradus Configuration Files]]</span> : <span>[[Configuration_Parameters_in_doradus.yaml|Configuration Parameters in doradus.yaml]]</span> : Doradus REST API Parameters</div>
  <hr />
  <div style="color: #4F81BD; font-family: &quot;Museo For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 10pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0AI0HA">Doradus REST API Parameters</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E06H0HA">These parameters configure the Doradus REST API.</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E05H0HA">restaddr: 0.0.0.0</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E04H0HA">By default, the Doradus REST API binds to address 0.0.0.0, which means it accepts connections directed to any of the host’s IP addresses (including “localhost”). Change this value if you want the REST API to accept connections on a specific IP address instead.</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E03H0HA">restport: 1123</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E02H0HA">This is the REST port that Doradus listens to. Change this to accept REST API connections on a different port.</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E01H0HA">maxconns: 200</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0ZH0HA">This is the maximum number of connections that the Doradus server will service at one time. If more than this number of connections is received, each additional connection is queued but not serviced until an existing connection is closed. This value also controls the maximum size of the REST server thread pool.</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0YH0HA">tls: false</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0XH0HA">tls_cipher_suites:</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0WH0HA">   - TLS_DHE_DSS_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0VH0HA">   ...</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0UH0HA">clientauthentication: false</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0TH0HA">keystore: config/keystore</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0SH0HA">keystorepassword: changeit</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0RH0HA">truststore: config/truststore</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0QH0HA">truststorepassword: password</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0PH0HA">As described in the section </span><span style="font-weight: bold;">[[Doradus_Security_Options|0]]</span><span style="font-weight: bold;"> </span>[[Doradus_Security_Options|Doradus Security Options]], these parameters should be set to configure TLS/SSL for the Doradus REST API and to restrict connections to authenticated clients.</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0OH0HA">max_request_size: 52428800</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0NH0HA">This parameter determines the maximum size of an input requested that is accepted. Requests larger than this are rejected and the socket is closed. The default is 50MB.</span></div>
</div>
